nodes.text: Emmoridg was a male Light Sith Lord who served as an overseer for the resurgent Sith Empire on Korriban during the Galactic Cold War. He secretly trained acolytes in the light side of the Force.

Lord Emmoridg was first mentioned in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. Although not mentioned by name, choosing dark side options for Jaesa Willsaam has her hunting down light-sided Sith instead of helping them.

The apprentice of another light-leaning Sith Lord, Jaesa Willsaam, discovered Emmoridg and contacted him. Emmoridg expressed concern that he would be discovered, and asked Jaesa and her master for protection for his students.

Many of his students were later hunted and tortured by Lord Cendence, a Sith Lord tasked with hunting down light-sided Sith, however Lord Cendence was stopped by Jaesa, ensuring the temporary safety of Emmoridg and his students.
